productText.text: Enjoy a delicate blend of White Cheddar, Parmesan and Romano cheeses

productText.text: Pour on vegetables and watch your family gobble them up

productText.text:
This Artisan Three Cheese sauce perfectly blends White Cheddar, Parmesan and Romano cheeses into a bold sauce that is sure to please the cheese lovers in your family. 
For great tasting recipes, visit Campbellskitchen.com/Prego.
productText.textHTML:
This Artisan Three Cheese sauce perfectly blends White Cheddar, Parmesan and Romano cheeses into a bold sauce that is sure to please the cheese lovers in your family. 
For great tasting recipes, visit Campbellskitchen.com/Prego.

productText.text: Get ready for the rustic flavor of Prego® Artisan Three Cheese Alfredo, blending cream, White Cheddar, Parmesan and Romano cheeses. It's silky-smooth and delicious!
productText.textHTML: Get ready for the rustic flavor of Prego® Artisan Three Cheese Alfredo, blending cream, White Cheddar, Parmesan and Romano cheeses. It's silky-smooth and delicious!

productText.text: Get ready for the rustic flavor of Prego® Artisan Three Cheese Alfredo. It has the ideal balance of cream, White Cheddar, Parmesan and Romano cheeses for silky, smooth flavor. Your family will love the indulgent touch this Alfredo brings to pasta or your own family-pleasing recipes.
productText.textHTML: Get ready for the rustic flavor of Prego® Artisan Three Cheese Alfredo. It has the ideal balance of cream, White Cheddar, Parmesan and Romano cheeses for silky, smooth flavor. Your family will love the indulgent touch this Alfredo brings to pasta or your own family-pleasing recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
